abstract: South Carolina dismisses quarterback Stephen Garcia from its football team after he fails alcohol test; Garcia, who had five previous suspensions from the team for various offenses, was subject to zero-tolerance agreement with the university and with coach Steve Spurrier.
snippet: After failing an alcohol test — the latest in a long line of transgressions — Stephen Garcia was cut loose by the Gamecocks.
lead_paragraph: After failing an alcohol test — the latest in a long line of transgressions — Stephen Garcia was cut loose by the Gamecocks.

headline.main: South Carolina’s Trouble-Prone Quarterback Runs Out of Last Chances
headline.print_headline: South Carolina’s Trouble-Prone Quarterback Runs Out of Last Chances
headline.seo: Stephen Garcia Dismissed From South Carolina Football Team
